attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. I was looking forward to downloading this app and supporting our beautiful, orange president, but I AM DISAPPOINTED to say the least. This app needs to be deleted ASAP and I will now be voting for Biden and encourage all of my friends to do the same. Vote Biden 2020.
attributes.title: Barron Trump

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to find out what Donald’s plans were to reinvigorate the economy after COVID, but all I got were pictures of trump nude with the caption “are you lost babygirl?” Is this some kind of glitch?
attributes.title: Possible glitch?

attributes.review: bruh this app is DISGUSTING. why is this on the app store???? it needs to be taken down IMMEDIATELY. i went on there to look at everything and i saw the worst stuff ever. it made my phone crash multiple times.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE.

attributes.review: Very terrible I got diabetes after downloading this app. Later on my family downloaded this app and they all have stds now I think this app is cursed by the orange. After this I began to sneak into the White House and I saw Trump smoking meth very unprofessional.

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever seen. I hate it. It takes my information, makes my phone lag and when I opened it, I saw something horrid. I showed this app to my mom and she started crying at how horrid this app is.
